Package com.thomsonreuters.upa.perftools.common

This package provides functionality shared by performance tools.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ResponseCallback
    Callback used for processing a response message.
    ShutdownCallback
    Callback used for shutdown.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChannelHandler
    Performs the associated with setting up and using UPA Channels, such as initializing channels, reading, flushing, and checking ping timeouts.
    ClientChannelInfo
    Used by the ChannelHandler object.
    CountStat
    Keeps an ongoing count that can be used to get both total and periodic counts.
    DictionaryHandler
    This is the dictionary handler for the UPA consumer application.
    DictionaryProvider
    Provides sending of the upajprovperf's dictionary, if requested.
    DirectoryHandler
    This is the source directory handler for the UPA consumer application.
    DirectoryProvider
    The directory handler for the upajProvPerf and upajNIProvPerf.
    ItemAttributes
    Class containing the attributes that uniquely identify an item.
    ItemEncoder
    Provides encoding of messages containing item data, in the forms of refreshes, updates, posts, and generic messages.
    ItemFlags
    Item flags.
    ItemInfo
    Contains information about a particular item being published.
    ItemWatchlist
    Item requests list.
    LatencyRandomArray
    Generates a randomized array that can be used to determine which message in a burst should contain latency information.
    LatencyRandomArrayOptions
    Latency random array options.
    LoginHandler
    This is the Login handler for the UPA Consumer and NIProvider application.
    MarketField
    Represents one field in a fieldList (used by MarketPrice and MarketByOrder messages).
    MarketPriceEncoder
    Provides encoding of a MarketPrice domain data payload.
    MarketPriceItem
    Market price item data.
    MarketPriceMsg
    Represents one MarketPrice message
    NIProvPerfConfig
    Provides configuration option for the non-interactive provider performance application.
    PerfToolsReturnCodes
    Return codes used by upaj performance applications.
    PingHandler
    The ping handler for the performance tools.
    Provider
    Maintains the provider application instance.
    ProviderPerfConfig
    Provides configuration that is not specific to any particular handler.
    ProviderSession
    Represents one channel's session.
    ProviderThread
    ProviderThreads are used to control individual threads.
    ProviderThreadInfo
    Information associated with a ProviderThread.
    ProviderThreadStats
    Statistics associated with a ProviderThread.
    ResourceUsageStats
    Resource Statistics (CPU & Memory Usage)
    TimeRecord
    Stores time information.
    TimeRecordQueue
    Stores a queue and pool of TimeRecord objects.
    ValueStatistics
    Class for calculating running statistics for a given value(such as latency).
    XmlItemInfo
    Contains information about an item in the item list.
    XmlItemInfoList
    Builds a list of items from an XML file.
    XmlMsgData
    Manages message data information from an XML file.
    XMLReader
    Base class for utilities reading from XML files.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DictionaryProvider.DictionaryRejectReason  
    ProviderType
    Provider Type Enums.

Package com.thomsonreuters.upa.perftools.common Description

This package provides functionality shared by performance tools.
